OOC: Okay for everyone this is Megatrons transmition. It is not from his
mouth, but rather a recording from Condor he got when screwing with
Condor's memory banks. He also has the Maximal emergency frequency to do
this. If this is modding, somebody tell me and I will backtrack, and quick
:)

BIC:

"I need to speak to Iron Raptor, it is very important, please help"
messages the frantic voice of Condor over the Emergency frequency.
